Our product, which holds immense value and significance to both of us, is being offered to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is an exceptional chance to acquire something truly remarkable at a competitive advantage. I trust this offer aligns well with your expectations and budget, allowing you to secure this masterpiece at a fantastic rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
